channel.title: Homes on Dmitry Borzov
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Dmitry Borzov

item.title: Dmitry Borzov
item.description: Hi, I am Dmitry Borzov I specialize in development of web and data analysis applications. My experience includes working with javascript [d3, Angular, Ember, node], golang, python [pandas, scipy, django, flask] and Java[Hadoop/MapReduce ecosystem, ElasticSearch] among other technologies. Open source projects (also, see my github account page) lsp: ls shell command alternative ls reimagined for modern times, with friendlier notations, built-in awareness of things like git repos and various dotfiles file datatypes.
